i1.blurb: Nasus drains his foe's spiritual energy, giving him bonus Life Steal.
description: {{sbc|Innate:}} '''Nasus''' permanently has {{pp|3|key=%|showtype=true|12 to 24|1 to 13}} {{sti|life steal|'''bonus''' life steal}}.
i1.name: Soul Eater

q1.blurb: Nasus strikes his foe, dealing damage and increasing the power of his future Siphoning Strikes if he slays his target.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Nasus's''' next [[basic attack]] within 10 seconds gains {{sti|range|25 '''bonus''' range}} and deals {{tip|physical damage|{{as|'''bonus''' physical damage}}}}.

If ''Siphoning Strike'' [[kill]]s its target, '''Nasus''' permanently gains {{as|3 stacks|Siphoning Strike}}, increased to {{as|12|Siphoning Strike}} if its target is a [[champion]], large [[minion]], or large [[monster]].
leveling: {{st|Bonus Physical Damage|{{tt|{{ap|30 to 110}}|Amplified by critical strikes and critical damage}} {{as|(+ ''Siphoning Strike'' stacks)|Siphoning Strike}}}}
q1.name: Siphoning Strike
notes: * ''Siphoning Strike's'' cooldown will not start until the enhanced attack is used or it expires.
* ''Siphoning Strike's'' bonus range stacks with {{ais|Fury of the Sands|Nasus}}, granting 200 total range.

* ''Nasus'' can gain ''Siphoning Strike'' stacks by last-hitting any targetable enemy units ([[ward]]s, structures, {{ai|Summon: Tibbers|Annie|Tibbers}}, {{ai|Powder Keg|Gangplank}}, {{ai|Prophet of an Elder God|Illaoi|Tentacles}}, {{ai|Void Swarm|Malzahar|Voidlings}}, {{ai|Jack in the Box|Shaco}}, {{ai|Noxious Trap|Teemo}}, {{ai|Shepherd of Souls|Yorick|Mist Walkers}}, {{ai|Eulogy of the Isles|Yorick|Maiden of the Mist}})
* ''Siphoning Strike'' will not generate stacks from secondary units killed by item area-of-effect damage ({{nie|Cleave}}, {{nie|Crescent}}, {{nie|Icy Zone}}).
* ''Siphoning Strike'' will not generate stacks from jungle plants.
* The enhanced attack will apply other [[on-hit effect]]s and can {{tip|critical strike|critically strike}} as normal.
* Only ''Siphoning Strike's'' base damage interacts with {{tip|critical strike|critical strikes}} but the bonus damage will still apply {{sti|life steal}} as well as affect structures.
* If ''Nasus'' is {{tip|blind|blinded}} ''Siphoning Strike's'' enhanced attack will not be consumed.

w1.blurb: Nasus ages an enemy champion, decelerating their Movement and Attack Speeds over time.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Nasus''' ages the target enemy champion for 5 seconds, {{tip|slow|slowing}} them by 35% and {{tip|cripple|crippling}} them by half that amount, both increasing over the duration.
leveling:
{{st|Maximum Slow|{{ap|35+3*4 to 35+15*4}}%|Additional Slow Per Second|{{ap|3 to 15}}%}}
{{st|Maximum Cripple|{{ap|(35+3*4)/2 to (35+15*4)/2}}%|Additional Cripple Per Second|{{ap|3/2 to 15/2}}%}}
w1.name: Wither
notes: * If ''Wither's'' duration is reduced by {{tip|Tenacity}} the effects will apply faster so the maximum values are reached when the shortened duration ends.

e1.blurb: Nasus unleashes a spirit flame at a location, dealing damage and reducing the Armor of enemies who stand on it.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Nasus''' unleashes a spirit flame at the target location, dealing {{tip|magic damage|{{as|magic damage}}}} to enemies in the area.
The flame then remains for 5 seconds, dealing {{as|magic damage}} each second to all enemies within and {{as|reducing their armor}} while they remain, lingering for 1 second.
leveling:
{{st|Magic Damage Per Second|{{ap|11|19|27|35|43}} {{as|(+ 12% AP)}}|Total Magic Damage|{{ap|110|190|270|350|430}} {{as|(+ 120% AP)}}}}<!--
-->{{st|Armor Reduction|{{as|{{ap|15|20|25|30|35}}% of target's armor}}}}
e1.name: Spirit Fire
notes: * ''Spirit Fire'' grants {{tip|sight}} of the target area (is smaller than the damage area) for a short duration on-cast.

r1.blurb: Nasus unleashes a mighty sandstorm that batters nearby enemies. While the storm rages, he gains increased Health, Attack Range, damages nearby enemies, has a reduced cooldown on Siphoning Strike, and gains bonus Armor and Magic Resistance for the duration.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Nasus''' empowers himself for 15 seconds, gaining '''bonus''' {{sti|health|{{as|health}}}}, {{sti|armor|{{as|armor}}}} and {{sti|mr|{{as|magic resistance}}}}, increased size, and {{sti|range|50 '''bonus''' range}} on his basic attacks for the duration.

While '''Nasus''' is empowered, he deals {{as|magic damage}} to all enemies around him each second, capped at 240, gains '''bonus''' {{sti|armor|{{as|armor}}}} and {{sti|mr|{{as|magic resistance}}}} each second, and {{ais|Siphoning Strike|Nasus}} {{sti|cooldown}} is reduced by 50%.
leveling:
{{st|Magic Damage Per Second|{{as|{{ap|3|4|5}}% {{as|(+ 1% per 100 AP)}} of target's '''maximum''' health}}|Total Magic Damage|{{as|{{ap|45|60|75}}% {{as|(+ 15% per 100 AP)}} of target's '''maximum''' health}}}}<!--
-->{{st|Bonus Resistances Per Second|{{ap|1|2|3}}|Total Bonus Resistances|{{ap|30|65|100}}}}
r1.name: Fury of the Sands
notes: * ''Fury of the Sands' '' bonus health is not affected by {{tip|Grievous Wounds}} and ''Nasus'' retains it once the duration ends.
